img_text: Ron Paul @RonPaul Aug 31 The Fed is a political creation. It was (unconstitutionally) formed by an Act of Congress in 1913. It can be abolished with an Act of Congress. The idea that the Fed is "independent" only serves as an excuse to keep its actions secret from the public. ronpaullibertyreport.com/archives/the-i 64 t2731 1.4K
